name: Blimpduino 2 Control APP (The Open Source Blimp)
description: (BETA) Control your blimpduino with this APP Heading/ Altitude and Assisted YAW and ALTITUDE HOLD control  How to use it: https://www.jjrobots.com/blimpduino-control-app-user-guide/ More info about the blimpduino: https://www.jjrobots.com/blimpduino-2/ Blimpduino 2.0 kit: https://www.jjrobots.com/product/blimpduino2-0/
